type1-name: A mysterious idol with an aura that can't be easily approached
type1-desc: You, who are in your own world, Why are you mysterious? Your charm is that they don't know what you're thinking.  That's why fans are attracted by you.🔮

type2-name: Everyone’s favorite idol who get along well regardless  If they are seniors and juniors
type2-desc: You are the Shining star of this era who makes every person you meet into a fan. 😎Great talking skills and friendly to people around you, make everyone your fan!
type2-partner: A mysterious idol with an aura that can't be easily approached
type3-name: Artist is better than an idol
type3-desc: You have your own worldview! you are the only one artist who captivates the public with music containing that worldview.🎤
type4-name: Passionate Idol about both performances and entertainment shows
type4-desc: You seem to be heading to the practice room ,As soon as you wake up in the morning.☀️ you, who is versatile, confidenat and dedicated, are passionate idol like a burning sun.
type5-desc: You, who are firm and have strong self-love, are 💖shining solo idols💖! You always try hard to produce good results.
type5-partner: passionate Idol about both performances and entertainment shows

type6-desc: Nobody know what you're going to do.🐶 You are an uncontrollably active, sociable mood maker who receives attention everywhere!

type7-desc: You're the best ballad singer who captivates the audience with your outstanding skills! With your soft charisma, you melt the hearts of fans like snow.
